alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:10PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pueblo County through 345 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Greenhorn Mountain, or 15 miles southeast of Junkins Burn Scar, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
